question: Suppose you have to fine-tune a pre-trained wav2vec 2.0 model on a new emotional‐speech dataset. Which steps would you follow (data preprocessing, training loop, hyperparameter tuning), and why?
transcript: If I have FI has a web to web model on a new emotional speech datasets, the step that I would follow are data processing training in global hyper parameter theory.

specific_suggestions: Ensure subject-verb agreement by matching singular subjects with singular verbs.
